ModMetaData.name: Tusken Gear Mod (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Worthless Wretch and Luwenstein
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/WAEzk68.png[/img] Update of Worthless Wretch and Luwensteins mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1285905055
[img]https://i.imgur.com/7Gzt3Rg.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/TuskenGearMod][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/NOW7jU1.png[/img] Tusken Gear Mod
A mod which adds tusken raider apparel and weapons.
All Star Wars™ references are made in pure love for the franchise and not in pursuit of profit
- All items are crafted at machining table. - Rifle got a huge (really huge) range, mediocre damage and very long windup. - Armor and headgear are supposed to be worn in hot climates as they provide high temperature resistance. - Female headgear can be worn by male colonists.
